title: Structural Technologies for Transportation and Infrastructure Applications': A Proposal for a Fact-finding and Exploratory Trip to India
abstractText: This proposal seeks to understand the capabilities of four premier Indian engineering institutions, namely the IITs at Chennai, Kharagpur and Mumbai and the IISc at Bangalore in the field of structural technologies and to inform pertinent colleagues in those institutions about Southampton interests and capabilities with a view to discuss long term research collaboration issues in related fields.
